name: Plumbus
description: A plumbus is... well, I mean... a plumbus is... well everyone's got one? Isn't that all that matters? It's a pretty standard household device, Morty. You don't hear people on Earth being like, "Oh, toilet paper? What's that???" Ok, fine, I'll be honest, I'm not really sure how to use the plumbus, Morty. Maybe we need to be in the perfect situation!
success_message: Check it out, Morty! The plumbus gets agitated near the lock on Summer's Cell. Something's happening!
failure_messages: Plumbuses are super useful, Morty, but this isn't the right place to use them
That won't help us right now, Morty.
The plumbus used splash. It's not very effective.
